location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 11; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file includes correspondence in which Mr Justice Hamilton, United Provinces High Court, Allahabad, requests assistance in finding the whereabouts of his wife, Mrs Suzanne Hamilton, in occupied France. Further correspondence between Sir Horace Williamson, Indian Police Service, and Sir George Warren, Prisoners of War Department, Foreign Office, documents subsequent enquiries to find the whereabouts of Mrs Suzanne Hamilton.
